channel.title: Whonix-CLI-15.0.0.9.4 gateway shows a black screen?
channel.description:
I just imported Whonix-CLI-15.0.0.9.4 for Virtualbox and when I start the gateway, I simply get a black screen.
It shows the Spectre mitigation and that sda is clean, then I get the black screen.
ACPI shutdown in virtualbox works.
What is wrong? What should I do?
